[b] The attack on Pearl Harbor was a surprise military strike conducted by the Imperial Japanese Navy against the United States naval base at Pearl Harbor, Hawaii, on the morning of December 7, 1941 (December 8 in Japan). The attack led to the United States' entry into World War II. The attack was intended as a preventive action in order to keep the U.S. Pacific Fleet from interfering with military actions the Empire of Japan was planning in Southeast Asia against overseas territories of the United Kingdom, the Netherlands, and the United States. There were simultaneous Japanese attacks on the U.S.-held Philippines and on the British Empire in Malaya, Singapore, and Hong Kong. The attack came as a profound shock to the American people and led directly to the American entry into World War II in both the Pacific and European theaters. The following day, December 8, the United States declared war on Japan. Domestic support for non-interventionism, which had been strong, disappeared. Clandestine support of Britain (e.g., the Neutrality Patrol) was replaced by active alliance. Subsequent operations by the U.S. prompted Germany and Italy to declare war on the U.S. on December 11, which was reciprocated by the U.S. the same day.[/b]

Day Of Defeat - реально неодоценённая игра. Если говорить кратко , то DOD - та же Counter Strike, но с немного изменённой механикой игры. Определённое оружие не закупается игроком, а автоматически выдаётся в зависимости от выбранного класса (прямо как в Team Fortress), игрок может ползать, добавлено ещё немного мелочей, да и собственно отличия заканчиваются. Но их достаточно для того, что бы игра стала непохожей на CS. Сама игра очень качественная : ходить по локациям, захватывать точки или расстреливать противников, например, из снайперского ружья - одно удовольствие. Но несмотря на всё это - игра не получила должной популярности, онлайн сейчас очень мал и постепенно уменьшается. Если бы не было сейчас CS 1.6 , то одной из самых популярных игр была бы именно Day Of Defeat.
А вам я советую поиграть в этот недооценённый шедевр или в его Source версию, это того будет стоить.
One of the most forgotten games made by Valve, so there you can play only as USA/Britain and Germany, which sucks. Not fully a good game, but still deserves a review. 7-10

Just started playing but I can tell already, I'm in love! It's an older game, (which I personally have no problem with), so of course you'll run into  your occasional glitch, but still, the gameplay and physics are astounding for game of it's age. The community is small, but strong, and extremely friendly, and welcoming. If you're down to spend a few hours chilling out with some kind people on a cozy server experiencing what games should be, then this is the game for you! I highly recommend this game for those who have a soft spot for classics.

A true war simulator. In a rare case when you can join a packed server you will get a glimpse of what this game was and it is great snipers pinning streets, small squads charging control points, Massive battles going on to capture the one white flag.

Graphics: Give the Graphics a pass on this one

Gameplay: Many classes to play as with diffrent weapons and skills

Game world: Believable destroyed streets, trenches and country side

Conclusion: Great game to play with friends or if you want to play alone 10/10

it may be an old game but there is still a massive player base and i bet you if you buy this game you will find a server that is nearly full cause how great this game. The besat way to describe this is if you like the simplicity and taticalness of the counterstrike but hate all the unfair hit boxes and the unbalenced movement system then this is the game for you its a cs1.6 WWII game with really good weapon balancing and hit boxes and a stamina bar which will give you the upper hand in a gun fight and games can go on for ages back and forth and can lead to some really intense team battles. overall 10/10 this is another of valves games that have stood te test of time

Being an avid DOD:S player for years on multiple accounts, this one being the most recent, I never really played the original DOD until justa  few years ago. The game has a lot more learning curves, more classes, more maps that aren't on DOD:S and a surprisingly active community. There is not a problem to find servers at all. The population is nothing like CS 1.6, but you will always find an active server. The gameplay is difficult though. You can't run and gun and the recoil is just as unforgiving as it is in 1.6

If you love older games, definitely get this gem and come on in! Lets keep this game alive!

On va faire simple.

Le jeu est excellent, les armes ne sont peut-être pas équilibrée pour certains, ce que je trouves stupides, néanmoins, je n'hésite pas une seconde à dire que je ne regrette aucunement les 112 heures que j'ai sur ce jeu.

Rapport qualité prix, c'est quasiment offert ce jeu.

La communauté est franchement sympathique, je n'ai jamais vu de gamins de 8 piges fan de CoD, qui hurle quand il se fait tuer.

Je ne caches pas que les graphismes font parfois pleurer les plus grands fan des jeux à beaux graphismes, mais bon, pour l'époque, c'était magnifique.

Attention cependant, le jeu n'est pas remplit comme la plupart des FPS, il n'y aura pas des centaines de serveurs pleins ou alors avec beaucoup de joueurs.

Néanmoins, je recommande fortement le jeu.

Merci Valve pour ce super jeu!

что лучше? COD WW2 или Day of Defeat? конечно DOD! тут ты не едешь по "прямой железной дороге" а сам решаешь чё делать. Здесь есть классы, в COD WW2 не хуя нету. Короче эта игра идеальна, хоть там играют в 2 смыслах старики (буквально и в словесном смысле) так что Activision, берите пример с этой игры, хоть вы и можете обосраться и с ней, но не так сильно как с предыдущими играми COD хотя бы. 12 встреченных мной стариков из 10!

Sure, this game is outdated, but I don't feel the decay as much as I do in TFC. The gun combat is still rather fluent, and all in all, I feel like this game definitely aged the best out of all the gold source games, yes, even more than 1.6 in my opinion. Sadly, people rarely play this game anymore. I'm lucky to find 2 full servers and a couple with less than 10 players. The rest? Empty. And in those with players still in it, well....They have been playing this game for ages, so you might have to get good almost instantly or go home. I still enjoy this game, and it's yet another piece of Valve's history.
